input.sentences: everyone is gathering together for a biking race .
everyone prepares for the event | all huddled together under a tarp .
racers begin to set out although the weather looks a little gloomy .
after racing it is time for a good lunch ! it is well earned .
the event was successful but it looks like the numbers of people is steadily decreasing .
output.sentences: I arrived to the destination and I can see the crowd of people getting ready.
Before the race starts we are all huddled around a fire to get toasty preparing to get wet.
The time has come and the riders are getting on the bikes to start the race.
At the end of the race everyone gets free food and beer. Score!
Of course after the race the weather has cleared up.
